Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER occurrences that are immediately followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that lead to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of the variant starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER compared to variants routed through ADMINISTRATION or BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER is followed by a re-submission loop (i.e., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER → Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that eventually result in Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER in variants that include more than one rejection cycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER occurring in declarations with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events grouped by case:BudgetNumber to identify budget-related routing patterns
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER that are not followed by any further activity (i.e., dead-end paths)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in successful end-to-end cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of all pre-approver-involved variants (those containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER) that end in rejection versus successful payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total number of approval initiation activities (including Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER events per year to assess temporal trends
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities
